title: Block Fortress (Native)
description:
Note: If there is a problem with the file permissions on this one(hopefully there isnt but just incase), then google "BatCHmod" its a free app and it will fix the permission problem.  Just drag the block fortress app to the open BatCHmod app window, make sure "change ownership and priviledges" and "apply to all enclosed files and folders" is clicked then click the apply button.  Its actually a very handy app has fixed many torrents i wouldnt have been able to use otherwise.

                                BLOCK FORTRESS


Block Fortress gives you the freedom to create a stronghold in almost any way you can imagine, and then puts you in the middle of the action trying to defend it from the relentless attacks of the menacing Goblocks! Put your skills as both a builder and a fighter to the test as you try to survive as long as you can!
